description: In this fantasy update, Ashley plays a horny girlfriend that wants her boy toy to stay home and just fuck all day. This isn't an uncommon request from her, but he can't miss another day of work. She convinces him to stay, but when she can't control her desires and crosses a line, he puts this bratty whore in her place. She learns quickly that her place is to serve him and not the other way around.
title: Ashley Fires - Learning Her Place
